function.name: drying_cancel
function.description: This function is used to cancel the drying operation on a specified compartment of the dryer.

location.description: The location where the dryer is located.

room.description: The room where the dryer is located.

device.description: The name of the dryer that needs to be cancelled.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the dryer that needs to be cancelled.
